outline:
1. to fight, do battle, make war
    1. (Qal) to fight, do battle
    2. (Niphal) to engage in battle, wage war
  2. (Qal) to eat, use as food
kjv_def: devour, eat, [idiom] ever, fight(-ing), overcome, prevail, (make) war(-ring).
strongs_def: to feed on; figuratively, to consume; by implication, to battle (as destruction)
